job_tasks.phrase: Design and develop machine learning models and tooling for pre-training and/or fine-tuning open source large language models.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes the core activity of developing and fine-tuning machine learning models, specifically large language models, which falls under the definition of 'Model Development & Fine-Tuning'.

job_tasks.phrase: Experience with the modern LLM stack incl. Retrieval augmented generation, parameter efficient fine-tuning, LoRA, etc.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions 'Retrieval augmented generation' and 'parameter efficient fine-tuning' (like LoRA), which are key components of prompt engineering and RAG systems.

job_tasks.phrase: Implement and deploy machine learning algorithms in a scalable and efficient manner, working closely with software engineers
job_tasks.justification: This describes the integration and deployment of ML algorithms into a production environment, a core software engineering task, emphasizing scalability and collaboration with software engineers.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with product managers to define and refine requirements and use cases for conversation intelligence.
job_tasks.justification: This involves working with product managers to understand business needs and translate them into technical requirements for AI features, aligning with 'Business Understanding & Strategy'.

job_tasks.phrase: Analyze and preprocess data from a variety of sources including numeric, text and other mediums
job_tasks.justification: This task involves the preparation and handling of data, which is a fundamental part of 'Data Engineering & Management' for ML models.

job_tasks.phrase: Conduct experiments and evaluations of machine learning models, using statistical methods and visualization tools to assess performance and identify areas for improvement
job_tasks.justification: This describes the process of testing and evaluating models, which is an integral part of the model development lifecycle.

job_tasks.phrase: Keep up to date with the latest research and trends in Generative AI, and contribute to the development of new algorithms and techniques
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the need for continuous learning and contribution to the advancement of AI algorithms, fitting within the 'Model Development & Fine-Tuning' category which includes research.

job_tasks.phrase: Participate in code reviews, testing, and documentation activities, ensuring high quality and maintainability of the codebase
job_tasks.justification: These are standard software engineering practices focused on code quality and maintainability, aligning with 'Software Development & Integration'.

job_tasks.phrase: Experience or interest in mentoring other team members and proactively sharing knowledge
job_tasks.justification: Mentoring and knowledge sharing are key aspects of 'Communication & Collaboration'.

soft_skills.justification: Indicates collaboration with another technical team.

soft_skills.phrase: Collaborate with product managers to define and refine requirements and use cases for conversation intelligence.
soft_skills.justification: This task involves understanding business needs and translating them into technical requirements, which falls under Business Understanding & Strategy.

soft_skills.phrase: Participate in code reviews, testing, and documentation activities, ensuring high quality and maintainability of the codebase
soft_skills.justification: Code reviews and documentation are collaborative activities that ensure code quality.

soft_skills.phrase: Experience or interest in mentoring other team members and proactively sharing knowledge
soft_skills.justification: Mentoring and knowledge sharing are direct examples of communication and collaboration.

profile.rationale: The job ad heavily emphasizes tasks related to Generative AI, specifically 'design and develop machine learning models and tooling for pre-training and/or fine-tuning open source large language models' (1.B.1) and mentions 'Retrieval augmented generation, parameter efficient fine-tuning, LoRA' (1.B.2). It also includes core software engineering tasks like 'Implement and deploy machine learning algorithms in a scalable and efficient manner' (1.A.1) and 'Participate in code reviews, testing, and documentation activities' (1.A.1). The role requires collaboration with product managers (1.C.1) and data preprocessing (1.B.3). The balance of specific GenAI tasks with core software engineering practices, and the focus on LLMs, clearly points to the 'Core GenAI Engineer' profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very specific about the tasks involved, clearly mentioning Generative AI concepts like LLMs, RAG, and fine-tuning, alongside traditional software engineering practices. The responsibilities are well-defined and directly map to the coding book categories, leaving little room for ambiguity in profile assignment.
